text: Ærest of crohwællan into mægidna brycge.
Of mægidna brycge eall abutotan snoddes lea in hymelbroc.
Æfter hunigburnan in godincges gemæra æt bradigcotan.
Of godinges gemæra into þam sice be croh lea wuda.
And æfter þam sice into oddinga lea wuda, ondlang þæs aldan geardstealles into hudigtuna gemæra.
And swa æfter þam hege stealle eft into crohwællan.
